last_result.summary: Atomic step completed on Task #19: project repository card now renders a secure clickable link only for valid http/https URLs, otherwise falls back to plain text.
proof: commit 181bf45: feat(project-page): render repository as safe external link
server.js: added toSafeExternalHref() URL guard (http/https only)
server.js: repository UI uses anchor with target=_blank + rel="noopener noreferrer" when URL is valid
